abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews Constance Marks documentary Being Elmo: A Puppeteer's Journey, which explores life of puppeteer Kevin Clash.
snippet: “Being Elmo” tells the story of the single-minded pursuit of puppet excellence by Kevin Clash, the man behind a certain fuzzy red creature.
lead_paragraph: “Being Elmo” tells the story of the single-minded pursuit of puppet excellence by Kevin Clash, the man behind a certain fuzzy red creature.

headline.main: Putting a Face to a Familiar Voice
headline.content_kicker: Movie Review | 'Being Elmo: A Puppeteers Journey'
headline.seo: ‘Being Elmo,’ About the Puppeteer Kevin Clash — Review
